title: Sergeant Swell of the Mounties
creator_credit: Chuck Menville, Len Janson and Pending Productions
brief_description: A spoof on the Royal Canadian Mounted Police in which our hero, Sergeant Swell, finds himself at odds with a local Indian tribe and a warrior who always seems to be just a few steps behind. Includes the ‘cliche’ lady in perpetual distress who requires continuous rescuing by the incompetent Swell.
